com.github.projectvk.model

Class NaturalEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.projectvk.model.NaturalEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dodo, Fox, Grass, Rabbit

    public abstract class NaturalEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    A class representing shared characteristics of animals.

      • giveBirth

        public void giveBirth(java.util.List<Actor> actors)
        Check whether or not this entity is to give birth at this step. New births will be made into free adjacent locations.
        Parameters:
        actors - A list to return newly born foxes.
